articles.title: Multithreaded parallelism in Numpy
articles.description: Numpy uses BLAS, a linear algebra library which actually uses multithreading for some algorithms. This article presents how to exploit this.

articles.title: Insights from writing an x86 emulator
articles.description: This article which TimDbg wrote presents some curiosities he discovered while writing an x86 emulator.

articles.title: Modern microprocessors explained
articles.description: This article explains modern microprocessor design, presenting many details which some may find interesting.

articles.title: Dispatch techniques for interpreters
articles.description: This article presents some of the more popular dispatch techniques used in the context of emulating. It has been of particular usefulness for me while writing an RISC-V executor.

articles.title: Breaking into the Google Chrome password store on macOS
articles.description: This article presents a way to access the Google Chrome saved passwords on macOS, by exploiting some OS features.

articles.title: Take on some language design choices
articles.description: This article critics some of the more popular programming languages in an ironic yet witty way.

articles.title: A radix sort paper #1
articles.description: This paper showcases some techniques that increases radix sort's versatility.

articles.title: A radix sort paper #2
articles.description: This paper is a direct continuation of the first one that I included, but by another author, that continues by presenting some optimizations brought to Pierre's implementation.

articles.title: MIT class on SVMs
articles.description: This is a video of a MIT class where SVMs are presented and explained.

articles.title: Mathematics behind SVMs
articles.description: This article explains the mathematics that stand behind SVMs.

articles.title: Softmax derivative
articles.description: This is a SO thread that contains some really helpful advice for implementing the softmax derivative.

articles.title: Softmax usage explained
articles.description: This is a SO thread that explains how to properly use softmax in neural networks. It helped me understand how to propagate the derivative.

articles.title: Stable softmax
articles.description: This article is a combination of a softmax implementation and an explanation. I decided to also include this one because it mentions a few tricks to keep the implementation numerically stable. It also showcases how easily it integrates with the cross entropy loss.

articles.title: Softmax usefulness
articles.description: This article presents why and where softmax is useful.

articles.title: CNNs cheatsheet
articles.description: This article presents a collection of information about CNNs from Stanford.

articles.title: Optimizing parameter count in CNNs
articles.description: This article presents some fascinating techniques for reducing the parameter count in CNNs.

articles.title: Transfer learning exemplified with CNNs
articles.description: This article is a useful tutorial on transfer learning. I decided to include it in the CNNs category because it exemplifies transfer learning on them.

articles.title: Texture tiling & swizzling
articles.description: This article explains tiling and swizzling of textures in graphics.

articles.title: Graphics programming blog
articles.description: Blog of a friend who posts mainly graphics programming related articles.
